statements: UPDATE products_inventory SET price = 19.99, stock_level = 100 WHERE product_id = 1;

UPDATE Products SET stock_level = stock_level + 10 WHERE product_id = 1;

UPDATE product_inventory SET stock_level = stock_level - 5, price = 19.99 WHERE product_id = 101;
